title: Practitioner-Tailored Workshop for Enhancing Higher Education Instructional Design Capabilities

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Advanced competency development program for instructional designers in mathematics within university-industry collaboration initiatives

learning_goals: Learners explain 15 core instructional design competencies (e.g., collaboration, problem-solving, technical expertise) tailored to higher education by linking them to real-world work cases.
Learners diagnose instructional design status within organizations and propose improvement directions using surveys and competency analysis tools.
Learners develop design plans incorporating ethical and legal considerations (e.g., copyright, data privacy) required for math curriculum design.

resources: Instructional Design Competency Analysis Survey Template

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
